mapper.insert: insert into orders(ordersid , ordercode , usersid , booksid , status , orderdate , thestart , theend ) values(#{ordersid} , #{ordercode} , #{usersid} , #{booksid} , #{status} , #{orderdate} , #{thestart} , #{theend} )
mapper.select: select a.* , b.username , c.booksname from orders a , users b , books c where 1=1 and a.usersid = b.usersid and a.booksid = c.booksid order by ordersid desc
select a.* , b.username , c.booksname from orders a , users b , books c where 1=1 and a.usersid = b.usersid and a.booksid = c.booksid and ordersid=#{ordersid} order by ordersid desc

select a.* , b.username , c.booksname from orders a , users b , books c where 1=1 and a.usersid = b.usersid and a.booksid = c.booksid
and a.ordercode like CONCAT('%', CONCAT(#{ordercode}, '%'))
and a.usersid like CONCAT('%', CONCAT(#{usersid}, '%'))
and a.booksid like CONCAT('%', CONCAT(#{booksid}, '%'))
and a.status like CONCAT('%', CONCAT(#{status}, '%'))
and a.orderdate like CONCAT('%', CONCAT(#{orderdate}, '%'))
and a.thestart like CONCAT('%', CONCAT(#{thestart}, '%'))
and a.theend like CONCAT('%', CONCAT(#{theend}, '%'))
